description:
Bitxel Roads is an innovative and pioneering project in the world of Ordinals and NFTs, inspired by the classic 90s game, Top Gear. Those of us who had the opportunity to have a Nintendo at home, thanks to our parents, experienced the amazing adventure with this game, which captivated many children of the time, including our entire team.

It serves as a perfect tribute for our Ordinals collection, as we can immortalize years of excitement in the game on Bitcoin. BITxel Roads is not just the first collection of profile pictures (PFPs) Fully  Arbitrary Token (FAT), it's a unique interactive experience centered on game car competitions.
name: FBitxel Roads
